duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting and assisting customers in a fast-paced food service environment.
Filling drink orders and processing payments efficiently.
Working in the drive-thru and taking orders from customers.
Maintaining cleanliness by cleaning tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant.
Following proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food.
Taking on more responsibilities, such as Certified Trainer, and cross-training in different positions within the restaurant.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (no experience required)
Paid training provided for every new Restaurant Cashier on the team.
Opportunity for additional training, certifications, and performance evaluations for pay increases within the first year.
